titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 290) establishing the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 2001, revising the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 2000, and setting forth appropriate budgetary levels for each of fiscal years 2002 through 2005.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-578, by Mr. Goss.

Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H. Con. Res. 290 with 1 hour of general debate. All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as read.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 206.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 474.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 221 - 205 (Roll no. 124).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/12/2000--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H. Con. Res. 290 (congressional budget).
